funny: Don we now our ugly sweaters… Let's party! Happy Holidays!
meaningful: May the Christmas Season bring only happiness and joy to you and your family.
religious: May your heart be lifted in praise this Christmas for the wonderful gift of Jesus and the joy He brings to our lives.
romantic: You're the most magical part of the most wonderful time of the year.
long distance: Even though we're apart, I'm sending you a special wish, a holiday hug and a mistletoe kiss!
quote: May this season find you among those you love, sharing in the twin glories of generosity and gratitude. -Oprah Winfrey

funny: Christmas is the only time of year in which one can sit in front of a dead tree and eat candy out of socks. Enjoy!
meaningful: The gift of love. The gift of peace. The gift of happiness. May all these be yours at Christmas.
religious: Merry Christmas! May God richly bless you throughout the year.
romantic: Your love is the best Christmas gift I could ever receive. Merry Christmas, sweetheart!
long distance: Far apart during this holiday, but totally together in our hearts and minds. Merry Christmas!
quote: Christmas is the day that holds all time together. -Alexander Smith

funny: Wishing you a white Christmas! (And when you run out of white, just open a bottle of red).
meaningful: Wishing you a season full of light and laughter for you and your family.
religious: Jesus is the reason for the season. Merry Christmas!
romantic: You're the partridge to my pear tree.
long distance: Sending a smile across the miles for a wonderful Christmas!
quote: I wish we could put up some of the Christmas spirit in jars and open a jar of it every month. -Harlan Miller

funny: You're a gift in my life. And not the kind I'd return for store credit. Merry Christmas!
meaningful: Best wishes for a joyous Christmas filled with love, happiness and prosperity!
religious: May God fill your Yuletide season and all your days with immeasurable prosperity and joy! Merry Christmas!
romantic: Christmas is more magical now that you're in my life!
long distance: I may not be nearby, but you are always in my mind and heart this holiday. Merry Christmas!
quote: Christmas will always be as long as we stand heart to heart and hand in hand. -Dr. Seuss

funny: A Christmas reminder: Don't try to borrow any money from elves ... they're always a little short. Have a Merry Christmas!
meaningful: May all that is beautiful, meaningful and brings you joy be yours this holiday season and throughout the coming year!
religious: Sending prayers and hearty Christmas greetings to you. May you receive the most special of God's blessings during this Christmas season!
romantic: Merry Christmas to someone who's sweeter than a candy cane, warms me up more than a cup of hot cocoa and fills my heart with joy more than the biggest present under the tree!
long distance: Missing you most during this festive time.
quote: One of the most glorious messes in the world is the mess created in the living room on Christmas Day. Don't clean it up too quickly. -Andy Rooney

funny: Wishing you hope, peace and lots of Christmas cookies this holiday season!
meaningful: Merry Christmas! Wishing you all the happiness your holiday can hold!
religious: May you have the gift of faith, the blessing of hope and the peace of His love at Christmas and always!
romantic: The only thing I love more than Christmas is you.
long distance: We may not be together on Christmas morning, but you're always in my heart.
quote: Christmas isn't a season. It's a feeling. -Edna Ferber

funny: They say the best Christmas gifts come from the heart … but cash and gift cards do wonders too! Happy Holidays!
meaningful: May your holidays sparkle with joy and laughter.
religious: Merry Christmas! I hope you receive one blessing after another this coming year.
romantic: It's not what's under the tree that matters most, it's who's around it. Every year I'm so grateful to have you there.
long distance: I wish we could be together this holiday season, but I'm sending warm wishes your way.
quote: A lovely thing about Christmas is that it's compulsory, like a thunderstorm, and we all go through it together. -Garrison Keillor

funny: Remember, Santa is watching. Everything. Yes, even that. Anyway, Merry Christmas!
meaningful: I hope the magic of Christmas fills every corner of your heart and home with joy - now and always.
religious: May the Lord grant you and all your loved ones peace, joy and goodwill.
romantic: You put the merry in my Christmas.
long distance: I'll miss celebrating with you this Christmas. Eat a few extra cookies for me!
quote: Christmas isn't just a day. It's a frame of mind. -Valentine Davies, Miracle on 34th Street

funny: Merry Christmas! May your happiness be large and your bills be small.
meaningful: Our family wishes you love, joy and peace … today, tomorrow and always.
religious: Wishing you a season that's merry and bright with the light of God's love.
romantic: Though we are apart, you are in my heart this Christmas.
long distance: We may not be able to rock around the Christmas tree together, but I'll deck the halls in your honor.
quote: Christmas Eve was a night of song that wrapped itself about you like a shawl. But it warmed more than your body. It warmed your heart ... filled it, too, with melody that would last forever. -Bess Streeter Aldrich

funny: This holiday season, let's make it a point to cherish what's truly important in our lives: cookies.
meaningful: May your family have a holiday season that is full of wonderful surprises, treats and nonstop laughter.
religious: May God's blessings be yours this Christmas.
romantic: Forget the mistletoe, you can kiss me anytime you like.
long distance: Even though we're apart, our hearts are together.
quote: Christmas is not an external event at all, but a piece of one's home that one carries in one's heart. -Freya Stark

funny: I told Santa you were good this year and sent him a link to your Pinterest board. Merry Christmas to you!
meaningful: Merry Christmas! Wishing you all the best this holiday season!
religious: May the wonder of that first Christmas, the joy of God's abundant blessings and the peace of Jesus' presence be with you always.
romantic: All I want for Christmas is you.
long distance: Let's have a Christmas video call - I'll bring the cocoa!
quote: I prefer the retro chic of spending Christmas just like Joseph and Mary did - traveling arduously back to the place of your birth to be counted, with no guarantee of a bed when you get there. -Tina Fey

funny: This Christmas, may your family be functional and all your batteries be included.
meaningful: Wishing you a Christmas that's merry and bright!
religious: May the true spirit of Christmas shine in your heart and light your path.
romantic: I'm so lucky to be spending another Christmas with you!
long distance: Christmas won't be the same without you here.
quote: I am not 100 percent certain what a sugarplum is, but for a few weeks every year I've got visions of them dancing in my head anyway. -Jane Green

funny: Merry Christmas! I put so much thought into your gift that now it's too late to get it.
meaningful: We hope you have a safe and relaxing holiday season.
religious: Wishing you and your loved ones a blessed Christmas.
romantic: Merry Christmas! You're the best gift I could ask for.
long distance: Even though we're apart, I hope you have a joyous holiday.
quote: The best of all gifts around any Christmas tree: the presence of a happy family all wrapped up in each other. -Burton Hills

funny: Please note: Christmas is canceled. Apparently, you told Santa you have been good this year … he died laughing.
meaningful: I hope your holiday season is full of peace, joy and happiness.
religious: May God bless and keep you during the holiday season and all through the year.
romantic: Holidays like Christmas make me so grateful to share life with you.
long distance: Consider this card a raincheck for a belated Christmas hug.
quote: Christmas is a season not only of rejoicing but of reflection. -Winston Churchill

funny: Is it just me, or does Santa look younger every year?
meaningful: Merry Christmas with lots of love.
religious: May God bless your life with love and joy this holiday season.
romantic: Christmas is magical because we're together.
quote: My idea of Christmas, whether old-fashioned or modern, is very simple: loving others. -Bob Hope

funny: Christmas is mostly for children. But we adults can enjoy it too, until the credit card bills arrive.
meaningful: I hope your Christmas is filled with joy this year!
religious: Merry Christmas! May God's love be with you.
quote: Peace on earth will come to stay, when we live Christmas every day. -Helen Steiner Rice

funny: Eat. Drink. Be Merry. Have a wonderful Christmas!
meaningful: Happy Holidays! I hope all of your Christmas wishes come true.
religious: May the spirit of Christmas be with you all year round.
